title: How to unsubscribe from EdEra (Ukrainian EdTech Studio)
description: EdEra is a Ukrainian online education studio that offers online courses, interactive textbooks, and educational blogs. To unsubscribe from EdEra, you can manage your email subscriptions or discontinue your membership.

steps_1.title: Unsubscribe via Email
steps_1.description:
To unsubscribe from EdEra's email communications, follow these steps:

*   Check your email for any newsletters or promotional emails from EdEra.
*   Open an email from EdEra.
*   Look for an 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of the email.
*   Click the 'Unsubscribe' link.
*   Follow the instructions on the page to unsubscribe from email communications.

steps_2.title: Discontinue Membership
steps_2.description: To cancel your membership and discontinue using content, simply discontinue your membership.

seo_text: Learn how to easily unsubscribe from EdEra's email communications and cancel your membership. Follow our simple steps to manage your EdEra subscriptions.
